text: The East Lancs OmniDekka was a double-decker body of a bus. It had a low floor. It was built from 2003 to 2011 by East Lancashire Coachbuilders. It was built on Scania N94UD chassis, Scania N230UD chassis and Scania 270UD chassis. title: East Lancs OmniDekka
